ABOUT.GREETING:
Hi, I'm Andreas. A dedicated developer and digital craftsman.
For me, programming extends far beyond mere syntax; it is a creative means of expression.

Let’s collaborate to architect the digital world and build something truly extraordinary.

SKILL.COMPETENCE: In my projects, I have used a variety of front-end technologies – for both static and dynamic websites. I have implemented responsive layouts.
SKILL.OVERLAY_INTERESSE: Feel free to contact me. I am eager to expand my existing knowledge and learn new things.

PORTFOLIO.SUBTITLE: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with the projects to see my skills in action.
PORTFOLIO.JOIN_DESC: A Kanban-style task manager that lets you create, organize, and move tasks using drag-and-drop, while also assigning users and categories to each task.
PORTFOLIO.LOCO_DESC: A fast-paced jump-and-run game where you guide Loco Pocco through obstacles, collect items, and reach the finish line across fun, challenging levels. Hola !
PORTFOLIO.JOIN_DIAL: Through working in a team, I learned how to communicate better, share responsibilities, and collaborate to find solutions together.
PORTFOLIO.POCO_DIAL: While building this game, I sharpened my problem-solving skills and taught myself how to design engaging game mechanics, smooth animations, and well-structured levels.

REFERENCE.TEAM1: Throughout his training, Andreas was reliable and motivated. He worked well both independently and in a team, stayed curious, and improved steadily
REFERENCE.TEAM2: During the project, Andreas stood out for his structured way of working. He delivered his tasks on time, and approached problems calmly. This made him a valued member of the team.
REFERENCE.TEAM3: Andreas was a reliable team partner on the Join project. He communicated clearly, supported others, and worked responsibly, helping maintain a positive team atmosphere.
